text: @IvankaTrump @WhiteHouse Covid-19 made it clear that wearing a mask is a sign of respect. Wearing a mask when around others is a civic responsibility & an act of solidarity: I wear a mask to protect you, you wear a mask to protect me. Everyone is better protected if we all do it.
